// Initialisiere ckeditor
$(function() {
	$('textarea.myckeditor').ckeditor({
		language: '[FORMAT,[Locale,System],{LEFT:2}]'
		//,customConfig: '/portals/[PortalID,System]/js/ckeditor_config.js'
		,customConfig: '/DesktopModules/RSE/RSEHtmlModule/js/ckeditor_config.js'

	});
});

","SkipProcessing":"true","AssignmentType":"0"},"ActionType":"Action-Assignment","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":32,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"VariableType":"","QuerySource":"noteid","QueryTarget":"@noteid","QueryTargetLeft":"'","QueryTargetRight":"'","QueryTargetEmpty":"0","EscapeListX":"0","Protected":"true","EscapeHTML":"true","VariableDataType":"Number","Formatters":""},"ActionType":"Template-Variable","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":33,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"securityQuery","Query":"/* set focus to item */
begin
	if [@noteid,variable] = '0' goto endsave
else
	Update [RSEShopUser]
	Set FocusArticleID= [@noteid,variable]
	where UserID = [UserID,System]

endsave:
end","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":34,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"RSEdevAllModules","Region":"FocusDefaults","ConfigurationID":"14013619-0422-7a18-8137-4b603dd99c2e"},"ActionType":"Action-Goto","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":35,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'delete'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-If","ChildActions":[{"Index":36,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"DELETE","Query":"BEGIN
declare @focusid int
set @focusid = ISNULL((select focusarticleid from [RSESHOPUser] where userid = [UserID,System]),'-1')
declare @ParentID int
set @ParentID = (select TOP 1 ParentID from [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticle where [DS_ID] = @focusid)

	UPDATE [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle]
	 SET 
		 [changeDateTime] = GETDATE()
		 ,[ipaddress] = '[Request.UserHostAddress,system]'
		 ,[userDeleted] = '1'
		 ,[IsActive] = '0'
		 ,[PortalID] = [PortalID,System]
		 ,[LastUserID] = [UserID,System]
	 WHERE [DS_ID] = @focusid

	delete from [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule where ModuleID = [ModuleID,System] and PortalID = [PortalID,System]
	insert into [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule 
		(UserID, ArticleID, ModuleID,IPAddress, PortalID)
		values([UserID,System], @ParentID , [ModuleID,System],'[Request.UserHostAddress,system]', '[PortalID,System]')

UPDATE RSEshopUser set [focusarticleid] = @ParentID where userid = [UserID,System]
END","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[]}]},{"Index":37,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'save'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":38,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"CompanyVariables","RenderType":"0","skipDebug":"false","includeSearch":"false","includeExport":"false","includeImport":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Region","ChildActions":[{"Index":39,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"VariableType":"","QuerySource":"frmBaseDescription","QueryTarget":"@frmBaseDescription","QueryTargetLeft":"'","QueryTargetRight":"'","QueryTargetEmpty":"NULL","EscapeListX":"1","Protected":"true","EscapeHTML":"false","VariableDataType":"Any","Formatters":""},"ActionType":"Template-Variable","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":40,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"VariableType":"","QuerySource":"frmBaseName","QueryTarget":"@frmBaseName","QueryTargetLeft":"'","QueryTargetRight":"'","QueryTargetEmpty":"NULL","EscapeListX":"1","Protected":"true","EscapeHTML":"false","VariableDataType":"Any","Formatters":"[|COALESCE,Value,,{DECODEURI}]"},"ActionType":"Template-Variable","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":41,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"VariableType":"","QuerySource":"frmIsActive","QueryTarget":"@frmIsActive","QueryTargetLeft":"'","QueryTargetRight":"'","QueryTargetEmpty":"0","EscapeListX":"1","Protected":"true","EscapeHTML":"true","VariableDataType":"Boolean","Formatters":""},"ActionType":"Template-Variable","ChildActions":[]}]},{"Index":42,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"SAVE","Query":"BEGIN
IF [UserID,System] = '-1' or [UserID,System] = NULL goto endsave
declare @focusid int
set @focusid = ISNULL((select focusarticleid from [RSESHOPUser] where userid = [UserID,System]),'-1')
	UPDATE [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle]
	 SET 
		[changeDateTime] = GETDATE()
		,[ipaddress] = '[Request.UserHostAddress,system]'
		,[IsActive] = @frmIsActive
		,[BaseName] = @frmBaseName
		,[BaseDescription] = @frmBaseDescription
		,[PortalID] = '[PortalID,System]'
		,[LastUserID] = '[UserID,System]'
	 WHERE [DS_ID] = @focusid
endsave:
END","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":43,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Type":"<Action>","Name":"RenderList","Value":"render","SkipProcessing":"false","AssignmentType":"0"},"ActionType":"Action-Assignment","ChildActions":[]}]},{"Index":44,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'new'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":45,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"SAVE","Query":"declare @articleid int
IF [UserID,System] = '-1' or [UserID,System] = NULL goto endsave
INSERT INTO [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle]
(
	UserID,
	IPAddress,
	PortalID,
	language
)
VALUES(
	'[UserID,System]',
	'[Request.UserHostAddress,system]',
	'[PortalID,System]',
	'[defaultlanguage,QueryFocusID]'
)
set @articleid = @@Identity

UPDATE RSEshopUser set [focusarticleid] = @articleid where userid = [UserID,System]
UPDATE [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticle set orderparentID = @articleid where ds_id = @articleid 
BEGIN
declare @focusid int
set @focusid = @articleid 
	delete from [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule where ModuleID = [ModuleID,System] and PortalID = '[PortalID,System]'
	insert into [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule 
		(UserID, ArticleID, ModuleID,IPAddress, PortalID)
		values([UserID,System], @focusid, [ModuleID,System],'[Request.UserHostAddress,system]', '[PortalID,System]')
endsave:
END
Select @articleid noteid","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[]}]},{"Index":46,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'newtranslation'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":47,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"VariableType":"","VariableDataType":"Any","Formatters":"","QuerySource":"frmNewLanguage","QueryTarget":"@NewLanguage","QueryTargetLeft":"'","QueryTargetRight":"'","QueryTargetEmpty":"NULL","EscapeListX":"0","Protected":"true","EscapeHTML":"true"},"ActionType":"Template-Variable","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":48,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"SAVE","Query":"declare @ParentID int
declare @ItemID int
set @ItemID = [FocusArticleID,QueryFocusID]
declare @returnmessage nvarchar(500)
set @returnmessage = 'ein entsprechender Datensatz ist bereits vorhanden'
set @ParentID = (select TOP 1 ParentID from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle where [DS_ID] = @ItemID)
declare @temptable table(SourceID int, IDspalte int identity(1,1))
--	if focus = master
	if @parentid = 0
		BEGIN
			--aktueller DS
			insert into @temptable (SourceID) 
				values(@ItemID)	 

			set @parentid = @ItemID

			--suche alle verbundenen Sprachen
			insert into @temptable (SourceID)
				(select [DS_ID] from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle 
					where [ParentID] = @ParentID
					and [DS_ID] not in (select SourceID from @temptable)
					and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0
					)
		END
	ELSE
		BEGIN
--	if focus = slave
			insert into @temptable (SourceID)
				values(@ParentID)	 
				
			--suche alle verbundenen Sprachen
			insert into @temptable (SourceID)
				(select [DS_ID] from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle 
					where [ParentID] = @ParentID
					and [DS_ID] not in (select SourceID from @temptable)
					and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0
					)
		END
			

if @NewLanguage in (select language from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle 
					where [DS_ID] in (select SourceID from @temptable) and language = @NewLanguage)
goto endsave
ELSE
--	neuer Datensatz
BEGIN
	INSERT INTO [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle (UserID, IPAddress, PortalID, ParentID,language) 
	Values ('[UserID,System]','[Request.UserHostAddress,system]','[PortalID,System]',@ParentID ,@NewLanguage)

Select @@Identity as noteid,@@Identity as FocusArticleID
UPDATE RSEshopUser set [focusarticleid] = @@Identity where userid = [UserID,System]
UPDATE [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle set orderparentID = @@Identity where [DS_ID] = @@Identity 
END
--set @returnmessage = 'eine Übersetzung in der Sprache' +@NewLanguage +' wurde engelegt.'

endsave:
--select @returnmessage as returnmessage","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[]}]},{"Index":49,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'edit'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":50,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Type":"Query-Query","GroupStatement":"","GroupIndex":"","Value":"declare @ParentID int
declare @articleID int
set @ParentID = (select TOP 1 ParentID 
		from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle 
		where [DS_ID] = [FocusArticleID,QueryFocusID] and PortalID = [PortalID,System] and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0)

if 1 = (select case when [FocusArticleID,QueryFocusID] in (
		select DS_ID from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle 
		where PortalID = [PortalID,System] and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0) 
	then 1 else 0 end)
begin
	set @articleID = [FocusArticleID,QueryFocusID]
end
else 
BEGIN	
	set @articleID = @ParentID
END


SELECT *
 FROM [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle]
where DS_ID = @articleID

","SkipProcessing":"false","AssignmentType":"0"},"ActionType":"Action-Assignment","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":90,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Type":"Query-Query","GroupStatement":"","GroupIndex":"","Value":"declare @articleid int
declare @childid int
set @articleid = (select ArticleID FROM [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticleToModule] where ModuleID = [ModuleID,System])
set @childid = (select DS_ID FROM [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle]
 		where (DS_ID = @articleid or ParentID = @articleid) and language = '[locale,system]' and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0 )


if @childid > 0
BEGIN
	 select * FROM [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle] where DS_ID = @childid
	 --goto endsave
END
else
BEGIN
	 select * FROM [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle] where (DS_ID = @articleid or ParentID = @articleid) and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0 
END
